title: Plastics
creator_credit: Holt, King Screen Films, Marilyn Sanders and Terry Sanders
brief_description: Looks at plastics being moulded in the factory into a variety of products highlighting the versatility of this product and its importance in our daily lives. Non-narrated using creative and evocative music and sounds. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
